issue.message: Attribute `android:digits` should not be used with `<TextView>`: Change element type to `<EditText>` ?
Attribute `android:inputType` should not be used with `<TextView>`: Change element type to `<EditText>` ?
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toUpperCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toLowerCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.

issue.message: To get local formatting use `getDateInstance()`, `getDateTimeInstance()`, or `getTimeInstance()`, or use `new SimpleDateFormat(String template, Locale locale)` with for example `Locale.US` for ASCII dates.
issue.errorLine1: formmattedIssueDate = SimpleDateFormat("EEE, MMM dd, yyyy H:mm").format(Date(this.shift.date))

issue.message: The attribute `android:allowBackup` is deprecated from Android 12 and higher and may be removed in future versions. Consider adding the attribute `android:dataExtractionRules` specifying an `@xml` resource which configures cloud backups and device transfers on Android 12 and higher.
This folder configuration (`v24`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 26. Merge all the resources in this folder into `drawable`.
This folder configuration (`v26`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 26. Merge all the resources in this folder into `mipmap-anydpi`.
Do not place Android context classes in static fields; this is a memory leak
This field leaks a context object
